description: Try our easy to follow Italian Chicken Casserole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Italian Chicken Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, heavy-based saucepan over high heat. Cook chicken, turning, for 10 minutes or until browned all over. Transfer to a large plate.

Return pan to medium-high heat, then cook onion and prosciutto, stirring, for 5 minutes or until onion is softened. Add garlic and chilli, then cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant. Add tomatoes, stock and olives, and bring to the boil.
Return chicken to pan. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and sauce has thickened. Season. Scatter over basil and serve with bread.
